sqlMap.select: SELECT C_ID, C_GID, C_NAME, C_DATE, C_ISLIVE, C_ORDER, C_SHAREURL,(select count(1) from t_game_child_action where c_indexid=#id# and c_source=#source# and c_type=2) as c_count,(select count(1) from t_game_child_action where c_indexid=#id# and c_source=#source# and c_uid=#uid# and c_type=2) as flag FROM T_GAME_INFORMATION_INFO WHERE C_ID = #id#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT C_ID, C_GID, C_NAME, C_DATE, C_ISLIVE, C_ORDER, C_SHAREURL, C_LOGOURL FROM T_GAME_INFORMATION_INFO WHERE C_GID = #gid# AND C_ISLIVE=1 ORDER BY C_ORDER DESC, C_DATE DESC) T WHERE ROWNUM <= #maxRows#) WHERE RN >= #startingIndex#
